website_summaries.verdict: These foldable binoculars are lightweight and waterproof with an anti-slip grip — an excellent package.
pros: These easy-to-focus binoculars have a textured rubber grip so they won’t slip, even if you’re using them in the rain
The lens are fully coated to increase light transmission and deliver high-contrast images
cons: The images may be blurry around the edges of the field of view

customer_reviews.title: fantastic clarity but its 8x25 NOT 10x25
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic clarity & low light efficiency for a compact, but definitely NOT a 10x25 - its only 8x25, which helps explain why the specs list a greater field of view for this binocular compared to other 10x25 binoculars. Overall its well worth the money, worthy of 5 stars as an 8x25 binocular best suited for children & young adults (but 4 stars due to false labeling)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports watching
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself to watch my husband surf, and before I even got to we went to the US Open surf competition and he comendeered them quite quickly! They are really awesome. He pretty much stole them from me and his exact words were “these are amazing! I can see everything!” I look forward to taking them to the beach now and watching my husband surf. He used to get lost in the sea of matching wetsuits. Now I can see his footwork when longboarding. Highly recommend. They are adjustable and fit both our faces.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Used even before our Alaskan trip
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are lightweight easy to adjust and my granddaughter loves them. As you can see she used them for her costume for for book club review. Once they were out of the box they were around her neck and she wanted you to look at what she was discovering. If you’re looking for a gift for a young child. This is an excellent one. We ended up with 3 to use on our AK cruise. Good for whale watching. Searching for eagles and other wild animals. *If you didn’t guess she read the Jane Goodall biography
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Really cool binoculars. Magnification is suspect
customer_reviews.text: This is a very compact and very cool set of binoculars fits really well in your hand and very easy to focus. The overalls use from the binoculars is outstanding as far as clarity. But I having used binoculars all my life I question the focus range because I thought images would be closer when using these binoculars. I was told through customer comments these were excellent for bird-watching which meant you needed binoculars for close-up viewing. I shall enjoy these binoculars very much but I think they fail me as far as surveillance use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E. May

customer_reviews.title: They were damaged at once.
customer_reviews.text: the images look good at the beginning, but then it became opaque, to the point that everything looks blurry, a total disaster.
customer_reviews.author: GINCSRL

customer_reviews.title: It’s not waterproof as it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof??? I don’t think so. My wife and I were together in the river, once it touched water forget about it, it fogged up instantly and we couldn’t see anything. Ruined our great view of the river that day and expected more from these binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: bethbintx

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off!! There should be laws for people selling inferior products online!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother. I just now got to see him and these crappy binoculars don’t WORK AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHARON J WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Not Wide Enough for Wide Heads
customer_reviews.text: If you are a large person you may not be able to spread the binoculars wide enough to see with both eyes clearly.
customer_reviews.author: RayConcordNH

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried them before I gave them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a client gift. Glad I tried them before I gave them. WORTHLESS I tried to view outdoors - worse than just using my eyes and the adjuster did nothing? Then I tried indoors to look at a clock - again - nothing. Returning them
customer_reviews.author: SJV

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to fit child to adult, would not expand enough for adult. Probably great for kids. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Young

customer_reviews.title: not sized for an adult
customer_reviews.text: I found the grip surface very comfortable but could not get my eyes to focus in the lenses. Magnification was sub par over long distances and blurry in short distances.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They got wet the day we bought them and have not worked since no waterproof as said needless to say a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an ecological research trip. The lens is poor quality for research. Hurt my eyes to use and my more-apt instructors confirmed that these suck.
customer_reviews.author: a.g.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly really good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a lightning deal. My husband has a very old pair of binoculars that he likes to use. I found these on a lightning deal at a good price and decided to give them a try. My husband was very surprised with the quality and says they are much better than the more expensive pair that he owns. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Havran

customer_reviews.title: Impracticable binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Far smaller than expected. Not very well made. Stiff adjustments. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Nice little binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: These are small. I would say more of a pair you use to travel with or a set to keep in your car. These work great for me and all of my kids. I have them in my living room near my patio door for any of us to watch the birds and animals in our back yard and woods. I have 4 kids, 16, 14, 10, and 5 years old. They can all use these with ease. My husband and myself use them easily as well. I highly recommend trying these out, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily at the beach to watch boats (and people!!!). They are compact, easy to hold and really serve my purpose. As I said, I’m not looking for enemy submarines...but birdwatching and a horse race is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They were great binoculars. Then they got splashed with water and stopped working. They were never even submerged and this was their first encounter with getting wet. I would test this feature out first if it is important to you. Very disappointing. Absolutely recommend against if you are looking for something waterproof as I was.
customer_reviews.author: Nirechica

customer_reviews.title: Good for my needs, but
customer_reviews.text: My new SGODDE Compact Binoculars for Adult Kids 10x25 Waterproof Binoculars are just what I need for my amatuer eyeballing. The only problem I have is that I can't thread the enclosed strap ends through one of the areas ... the area is too SMALL. I have to find a way to get a strap on it so I can carry it around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BINOCULARS FOR YOUR NEXT ADVENTURE
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are great for viewing the variety of different birds when the weather got warmer. You're able to zoom in and see the detail colors that are displayed on the birds. My father borrowed these binoculars and took them on the golf course and was able to view the ball down the fairway. He had no problem using the binoculars early in the morning until the afternoon. These binoculars are light weight and very compact which is great to have on your next adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Ena M

customer_reviews.title: See an Alligators Iris From 200 Yards!
customer_reviews.text: That's the minimum distance I want to be from an alligator's iris and these little binoculars are just the babies to use. You can't make a better purchase for value to quality ratio. I bought them for me and my husband and then our "what do women know" neighbor thought they were pretty cool and decided "a woman might know something after all!"
customer_reviews.author: CindyCBL

customer_reviews.title: affordable compact binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I carry these in my day pack for hiking. They are inexpensive and adequate for spotting birds, animals, and features at a distance, but are not top quality. That's an ok trade-off for affordability. I have a small face and the eyepieces are close enough together that I can see through both of them, unlike some of the larger binoculars. They are easy to focus. Overall happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how good these binoculars are for the price! I mean I got them for around 20 bucks. Honestly I didn't really need some binoculars but I saw it on a lightning deal so I impulse buyed. They work very well, they are very lightweight and the build quality is very nice. They came with a nice little case and the lenses have a very nice coating on them and there is no glare. The focus knob in the middle is nice and tight definitely do not feel cheap or flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sproul

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Weight!
customer_reviews.text: I love these binoculars because they are so light. I am a photographer and I use these when I am out photographing wildlife. They work almost as good as my more expensive pair. They are so small and light weight that I can wear them with my camera and still be comfortable. These are also great for kids to use . I like them so much that I bought a second pair to keep by the window to spy on the birds at my feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Focus is a breeze with just one knob to adjust. Eye cups are comfortable. It will come in handy for recreational use for ball games and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: We love these! Lightweight and very clear
customer_reviews.text: We took these to the ocean with us and how awesome! We could see the lighthouses up close, boats, and anything we wanted! They are lightweight, compact, and super clear and easy to adjust! My 5 year old was able to use them with ease. I highly recommend these for an affordable nice pair of binoculars!
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sleek like your usual set of binoculars. I happened to be outdoors when I received this package, I was able to see a bald eagle glide far up in the trees clearly. This binoculars are great for well lit areas such outdoors during the day, sporting events and concerts. It’s also durable and comes with a carry case and lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Salvader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a nice gift for my dad since he likes to go hunting. He really liked it and said that it has a good grip and the magnification is very powerful. It was built out of a metal like material and I feel like it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Orr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, portable outdoor binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: These are small and lightweight but have a wonderful viewing! This is perfect for me, i tried them out today as soon as i got them! I can see the birds amazingly, and I can't wait to take them on the boat to see what is up ahead and fund good fishing spots!!! I could even read a small sign on a building 2 blocks away!! The adjustments are easy to fund and focus, and they move to fit your eyes!!! I will definitely cherish these durable binoculars for years to come. I'm even planning on buying some more to give to my fellow camping buddies!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't Spend A Lot of Time Comparing
customer_reviews.text: We wanted small binoculars for our trip to Europe including a cruise. They worked fine for looking at castles and vineyards from our boat. The binoculars weren't heavy or hard to hold and use. However, I spent a lot of time comparing these to the Aurosports 10X25 binoculars. The box was different and one came with a flimsy lens cover, but otherwise they were identical and made in China. So buy which ever one is less money!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Amundson

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great!  Really great optics!
customer_reviews.text: Great optics that provide a very sharp, clear, bright view - even of items far away. Compact. Very lightweight and easy to tuck away in a backpack or messenger bag and easy to carry anywhere. And a great price! Highly recommend! P.S.: I bought the first one for my brother. And I liked it so much, I just purchase the second one for myself. Really great compact binoculars. Excellent clear vision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.  Really works.
customer_reviews.text: They work. Not just a toy, although our grands love watching birds and wildlife with them....without adult supervision to protect an expensive tool. Easy to adjust, and they look so very REAL.
customer_reviews.author: TX Florist

customer_reviews.title: Expect excellence
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clear vision. I live in a light polluted area with very little view of stars. Happy to say I see more stars and the view of the half moon was very revealing. I’m taking these binoculars with me everywhere. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collecting needed gagets, Corona, eye opener.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that's about the cutest little binocular I have ever owned. Reasonably priced, a well made product., the view is clear, distance and zoom is just right, as if you are right there. I like it and would recommend this product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyne Longchamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed with these binoculars for only $20. They are light and compact and come with a storage pouch and neck cord. I like that they can easily fit in a purse or small backpack or comfortable around my neck. I was able to see clearly through them and will use them for nature viewing, sports games, and concerts.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Clear view, easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I visit natural parks and wildlife reservations a lot. And, I was looking for easy to handle, but efficient binoculars as the binocular I bought about 15 years ago was very heavy. And, I am satisfied with this one. 10x zoom and clear view. It comes with a bag that can be hooked up with a belt, so you have to be less worried about losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Upahar J

customer_reviews.title: Our 3rd Pair
customer_reviews.text: Loved them so much we just purchased our 3rd pair. Very small and light but great power and view. Perfect for keeping in glove box. Great for kids too, our 5 year old can easily used them but equally perfect for adults.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Since corona hit, I have to sit in the parking lot to watch my son practice baseball. These are perfect for that. If you're expecting a $300 set of binocs, you're in the wrong place as far as performance. These are spectator binocs and they do a fantastic job.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a jeep safari in Africa. I'm a female with medium size hands, but I found these binoculars a bit too small and a little difficult to hold. They are also a little difficult to adjust. I definitely don't recommend for a man, or for a woman with large hands. Will give these away.
customer_reviews.author: walkabout

customer_reviews.title: Small, but decent size and price
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for traveling, or like us--for bird watching in our backyard. Small enough that it will not take up a lot of room in your luggage (carry on would be a safer place for these). Economically priced and a guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome, easy to use, easy to hold. It is not a fancy item but the quality and the performance of the binoculars are great! I strongly recommend this product if you’re looking for a cheap and good quality binoculars, they are great for birdwatch purposes and many other activities. Great option!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: very clear
customer_reviews.text: My sons love these! Had to get another set because "They're using all of the pairs and I don't have one!!" The old military set are so big and heavy and starting to become unclear. I tested this to spy on my neighbors new car in their driveway;) crystal clear!! lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, I did not expect much for $20 but I was very pleasantly surprised. I expected cheap plastic, but these things are very well made. The seem fairly durable and give you a great image. I am using them to watch birds on the lake that I back onto and they work great. They are compact and just work great. Well worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Kirbinster (Howard)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great solution to the fight over our one pair of binocs each time I hiked with my grandkids. Now they each have their own! These are the perfect size for their little heads and lightweight enough to carry in their backpacks. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw23

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mom, and she loves them. She has recently gotten into birdwatching and she wanted a high powered and lightweight pair of binoculars for her new hobby. She loves how compact they are and easy to pack. She says they are one of the best pairs she has ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Mislead
customer_reviews.text: No night vision! Was my purpose of purchasing ! Unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Simpleman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a lightning deal for $17 bucks and I couldn't be more pleased. Compact, lightweight, and good optics. Perfect fit for the glove box. For the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great little binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly, a very good set of binoculars. I wasn’t certain about the size and quality till they arrived. They worked perfect for me when hunting. Small enough tho tuck in my jacket when climbing a into a stand. Makes using you scope obsolete. Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: rwm

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with this product. I'm afraid they may be big and bulky, but the opposite is true. One hand can be held comfortably and beautifully. There are no colours on the glass, so you can see them clearly and adjust the vision of the two lenses to get a clearer visual effect. To make a long story short, if you click on this product because your interest is infuriated, but you're not sure what you've got, don't worry... Your money will be well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for my eyes and the focus adjustment is difficult to get correct. I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Zebrowski

customer_reviews.title: These are what you'd expect for the money, but thoroughly decent.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little binoculars. The strap is thin and cheap (lightweight), but functional. The adjustment is pretty simple, and these have very clear picture. You can tell they're pretty cheaply made, but they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great one for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for this item, but it sure works amazing. And it is supposed to be waterproof. I would not mind losing or breaking this one for the price, happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S.Etank

customer_reviews.title: Clear view and long distance
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are awesome. I live on the shoreline and I can watch the ships enter and exit the Panama Canal from my bedroom window. Great value and clarity is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never heard back.
customer_reviews.text: We emailed the seller, about the button not working, shutting off/on. I never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear view
customer_reviews.text: Cute for kids but for adults Can’t see well with glasses on So can’t use them Eye lashes touches the lenses without glasses on Clear view though
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are small and decent binoculars that are good for watching backyard feeders. Clear and variable settings by rolling the center wheel on the top of the device. If you have 20/20 or close these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these binoculars, especially for the money. They have very good, clear optics, fit my hands well, and do the job quite well. These are great little take along binoculars for camping, bird watching and general all-around use. I don't expect the same performance as my Zeiss binos, but for what I bought them, they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: glitch

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up for my dad who is getting into bird watching. He specifically request compact binoculars and these do feel light weight and compact. The 10x zoom is good as too much zoom with unsteady hands is hand to control. The grips are nice and wide for easy gripping. All he needed in a budget pair of binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these binoculars far exceeded my expectations. I bought a pair for my daughter and was very impressed with the clarity of the glass and magnification level. Going to order a second set for my son to replace his lesser quality ones. Can't really beat these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BBBC

customer_reviews.title: Great economical binonculars
customer_reviews.text: bought for our pontoon on the lake -- it's now our favorite pair, over 3 others. We've tried bigger ones, smaller ones, and these are just right.
customer_reviews.author: K. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like these binoculars, they are lightweight so makes it easy to take on a hike or walk in the woods. These bring far away items up close and personal, great for viewing birds or other animals up close. Have not yet used them for sporting events but am sure they will make it more enjoyable. I recommend these for anyone looking for a pair, makes a nice gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: For kids only
customer_reviews.text: It’s for kids. Quality acceptable. No lens covers on either lens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like em!  work well, don't take up much space for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to Egypt, but ended up not needing them. Now I keep them in my car to see birds, and wildhorses. I like the feel, the case.. great.
customer_reviews.author: annieb

customer_reviews.title: Not. Night vision
customer_reviews.text: Miss representation. Night vision is night vision. It either is or isnt. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: kim baker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great binoculars. The night vision is superb! They are very durable as my child drops them frequently when we are out hiking. They fold up nicely and don't take up a lot of space. Great price point!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nourse

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price 🇺🇸👍
customer_reviews.text: I got these for $16 bucks on sale and these are pretty good binoculars. I think these would also be good for young kids to mess around with for there 1st binoculars. I recommend these 👍🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: deadhead

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids, but not adults
customer_reviews.text: Rubber cover for eye lens was deformed. Very small viewing lens. iphone camera will not work due to small size of the viewing lens
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the cost. I bought these as a cheap pair to keep on my boat and use once in while. Seems to do the job I need!
customer_reviews.author: tedbassDOTcom

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard bird watching!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for backyard bird watching! Super clear, easy focus, great zooming and really great in low light! Good purchase for price for sure!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Poor optics
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have spent a little more money and gotten better quality. Poor optics, not very clear images.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these for my mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom has recently gotten into bird watching. I wanted a compact, light weight pair of binoculars as a gift for her. These are absolutely perfect. Not overly complicated to use, and allow her to check out and study her favorite companions in their natural habitat without too much trouble for her. That's a win! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 binoculars for our trip to Grand Canyon. The one different brand cost about $10 more, same specs. I like the other one better.. more clearer than this one
customer_reviews.author: H. LIE

customer_reviews.title: decent enough!
customer_reviews.text: They are a sturdy pair. Not the best for viewing against sun, obviously. But do a decent job and are a good price. I like the size of them and the grips feel nice. I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and take traveling
customer_reviews.text: WE used these for whale watching on our alaska cruise last fall they worked great and nice and light weight, unfortunately we didn't see any whales. but we saw lots of other wildlife
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Simple binoculars, get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about binoculars. They get the job done, and have a wide range of distance. Build quality is really tough and sturdy. Dropped them from waist height twice so far and nothing has happened, other than minor scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Aldana

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: Great little binoculars. If you are looking for an inexpensive set of binoculars, these binoculars are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Real Unbiased Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good, small, light, very clear, no distortion, there are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: With a rubber grip they're very easy to hold in one hand and to focus in low light and night conditions they work very well of course it depends on your vision
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Compact
customer_reviews.text: Great little binoculars! I love that they are so compact. I love using them to look at the birds in the trees out of my back window. Will be excellent little binoculars to have for trips and adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take on vacation. They were light, compact and were easy to use. They provide an excellent quality view for the price. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeFreek

customer_reviews.title: Do not open far enough to fit my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother if you have wide-set eyes, they will only work as a monocular, not a binocular.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg McRaw

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Took them on a cruise to look for wildlife and birds.
customer_reviews.author: P. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not really night vision, but they do gather a large amount of light, very clear and crisp image, for the price, well worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity
customer_reviews.text: Wish the night vision was better. Great distance and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Demarcus Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and carry!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and carry! I was always curious about the view far away from me. I bought this for outdoor activities. Clear as I though! Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cool compact clear
customer_reviews.text: I can see you waaaay over there and that's what these do
customer_reviews.author: Mke B

customer_reviews.title: Decent portable bunuculars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son to take to Iguazu. He really enjoyed watching birds and the falls yoclose with those! Easy for kids to maneuver as well as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for girl and boyscout
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for my son on the boyscout camp. Light weight, compact, and very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 month with very minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 1 month with very minimal use. 1 side stays focused and the other does not, they are out of sync so I have a monocular instead of binoculars and not being able to return for a defective product after 2 months is dissappointing. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price you can see really well in low light. Theyre not the best Ive used but they also arent 500 bucks! Good to throw in a scouting bag to get beat up - they see good, and they dont seem to break terribly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great deal, very nice
customer_reviews.author: love9099

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair of binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of binoculars I’ve ever owned! They came with a well made, Velcro-sealed travel bag with a lanyard and micro-fiber cleaning cloth. The focus is easy to adjust, the sight picture is clear, and they fit perfectly in my hands. They are lightweight and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin M

customer_reviews.title: perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: nice and sturdy. they are easy to focus. very good size, not bulky at all but not too small. they work really well
customer_reviews.author: Marie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Great for day hiking, watching wildlife and bird watching. Carry them with me in high humidity, light snow, and lots of rain. They never fog up and outperformed similar binoculars I previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: E.Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clear views
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little set of binoculars for the price. They are easy to adjust and they give you a good view from a surprising distance. I could see my neighbors license plate down their drive across my yard and the street.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hunting!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for hunting! My so. In law went ape over them! He said they are great. This is a life long hunter. The vision is good, easy to focusin, and you can see quite a distance!
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Convenient size
customer_reviews.text: Fasst delivery and very satisfied with product, everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A. David Bird

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and crystal clear view binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are really easy to adjust, and easy to hold and give a crystal clear view. They are so lightweight we will be taking them on our trip to Machu Picchu!
customer_reviews.author: Skyspy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised man... Excellent clarity and does enhance targeted areas with low light. Impressive...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the money. Have not tried the night vision yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cgull

product_meta.title: SGODDE Compact Binoculars for Adult Kids 10x25 Waterproof Binocular Weak Light Night Vision Folding High Powered Clear Binoculars Lightweight Bird Watching
feature_bullets: 【HIGH PROWERED FIELD & LOW NIGHT VISION 】 - 10x magnification with 25 mm objective lens,you even can get a 362 feet wide view at 1000 yards far away.You can see the stuffs clearly in weak light condition(NOT DARK).
【FULLY COATED OPTICS 】 - All lenses are made from Bak-4 prisms with FMC multi-layer broadband green film, the light transmittance increases up to 99.5% for brighter and higher-contrast images.

【EASY TO FOCUS】 - It equiped with a easy central focusing knob and adjustable right eyepiece to fit different view distance,even kids can use it easily.Rubber cover can be rolled down, also perfect for glasses wearer.

【WATER-PROOF&ANTISKID】 - Durable rubber texture anti-slip grip against careless falling or accidental crash. It is waterproof(Grade IP4),you can use this item in different situations in your daily life.

【LIGHTWEIGHT & 1 Year Warranty】 - Contemporary style, lightweight and compact(0.55 lb,5.12x5.12in), you can put it into your pocket to go where you want to go!
